entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 3:35PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTRY MIX EXPECTED FOR SOUTHWEST ALASKA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... A series of weak fronts will move through Southwest Alaska this weekend, each bringing multiple types of precipitation. Snow has developed this afternoon along the Southwest coast and is pushing into the interior of Southwest in advance of the first front. A brief period of freezing rain is possible for these areas Saturday
